text:
How can I pass through keywords and combine them with other keywords, e.g.
```my_plot(x; kw...) = plot(x, legend=false; kw...)```

elements.text: How can I pass through keywords and combine them with other keywords, e.g.

text:
```julia> f(x; kw...) = kw
f (generic function with 1 method)

julia> g(x, kw...) = f(x; kw..., a = 10)
g (generic function with 1 method)

julia> g(1, a = 1, b  = 2, c = 3)
pairs(::NamedTuple) with 3 entries:
  :a => 10
  :b => 2
  :c => 3```

text: In other words, if you set a keyword before splatting, it can be overridden by the contents of the splat. If you set it after, it'll override the splat.
